PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Full Guide: https://youtu.be/6T1ndsDe2KM Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/EsoroGuides
Build Updates:
NOTE: Enduring Cry and Call to Arms have been added to this build. I advise binding Enduring Cry to left click in place of move only. This will automatically trigger granting tons of extra life sustain.
NEW CHANGES: - This dodged most of the alterations to Necromancer. Only receiving a slight nerf from the minor ascendancy nodes. - However, some of our best cluster jewel notables have been nerfed as well. The combined hit is not massive and shouldn't make a massive difference.
OLD CHANGES:
Harvest Changes: - The inclusion of Cluster Jewels, some skill tree optimizations and the addition of Impale to our Zombie six-link has led to a significant damage increase for the build going into Harvest.
Main Delirium Changes: - This build received a variety of nerfs in Delirium but will remain strong. - Overall We lost around 6000 of our Energy Shield leaving us with around 6000, 4-5 Total Maximum Zombies leaving us with 12 and some of our free resistances making gearing a bit tougher.
Gear Changes: - Blood of the Karui has been swapped in for some powerful recovery.
Gem Changes: - Impale support has now replaced Feeding Frenzy. This provides an extremely significant damage increase and is heavily recommend. - Flesh Offering has been swapped in for the nerfed Spirit Offering. - Added Enduring Cry. I advise binding this to left click in place of move only. This will automatically trigger for huge life gain and will be used instantly with Call to Arms.
Tree: Changes: - The tanky and dps skill trees have been converted into cluster and non cluster instead. - Call to Arms was added to the build alongside Enduring Cry.
Ascendancy Changes: - Dropped Mistress of Sacrifice for Commander of Darkness. This grants both us and our minions a huge chunk of resistances and some offensive power.
